item.description:
Join us - no need to be alone on Valentine's Day!
Great friends,,,,,,,,,,FUN Laughs...........and lots of smiles! RESERVATIONS ARE HELD FOR THE FIRST TWENTY (20) YES RSVP'S! The reservations are for TWENTY only. - Dip Into Something Different - at The Melting Pot on Route 9 in Framingham, MA. There is a 'set menu' for this date as it is a holiday evening. You can pick from Shrimp Cocktails OR Brushetti AND you can pick from Bourbon Bacon Chedder Cheese Fondue OR Cheesy Fondue AND there are two kinds of salad AND ALL OF THE FOLLOWING is included in the price per person: Filet Mignon; Lobster Tail; Key West Scallops, Sweet & Spicy Chicken; Citrus Pork and Spinach Ravoli's. We will definitely be full after all of this food! Ooops, almost forgot about the dessert, which is also included: Love Chocolate Fondue OR Girlscount Cookie Fondue. Yep, this is a FIVE-COURSE MEAL! The cost is $60.00 per person. Well worth it with all we will be served! Love to you all, sign up today!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the hostess area! Ask hostess for Linda!
item.name: The Day Before Valentine's Day!
